expertiseDomains.expertise:
Eric Fiechter advises private clients and corporations investing in or through Switzerland.
He advises several foreign banks and financial companies in Switzerland and is a member of their Boards of Directors.
He regularly advises clients who are interested in using Singapore as a business hub and generally facilitates European-Asian business exchanges.
Eric Fiechter assists high net worth individuals with estate planning issues.

Eric Fiechter serves advisor and as party appointed arbitrator in a number of international arbitration proceedings including under ICC rules as well as under the Swiss Rules.
Eric Fiechter also acts as mediator, in particular in the context of international commercial disputes.
